item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, February 4, 2025 at 3:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. El Salvador abandons Bitcoin as legal tender after failed experiment (446 points | 273 comments)
2. The Video Game History Foundation Library Opens in Early Access (62 points | 4 comments)
3. US Bill Proposes Jail Time for People Who Download DeepSeek (371 points | 219 comments)
4. Ask HN: Who is hiring? (February 2025) (371 points | 345 comments)
5. Open Euro LLM: Open LLMs for Transparent AI in Europe (96 points | 34 comments)
6. Httptap: View HTTP/HTTPS requests made by any Linux program (386 points | 98 comments)
7. AMD: Microcode Signature Verification Vulnerability (183 points | 78 comments)
8. Order Declassifying JFK and MLK Assassination Records [pdf] (133 points | 100 comments)
9. The young, inexperienced engineers aiding DOGE (1047 points | 1531 comments)
10. Implementing a linear collider facility at CERN (4 points | discuss)
11. Macintosh Allegro Common Lisp (31 points | 6 comments)
12. He went to jail for stealing someone's identity, but it was his all along (175 points | 172 comments)
13. AI systems with 'unacceptable risk' are now banned in the EU (162 points | 147 comments)
14. I Wrote a WebAssembly VM in C (245 points | 55 comments)
15. Show HN: I convert videos to printed flipbooks for living (357 points | 85 comments)
16. Developer Philosophy (178 points | 48 comments)
17. Ask HN: Who wants to be hired? (February 2025) (120 points | 271 comments)
18. Auto-AVSR: Audio-Visual Speech Recognition with Automatic Labels (24 points | 1 comment)
19. The Cantonese Scrolls (粵卷) – A Cantonese Language Learning Mental RPG (82 points | 31 comments)
20. First place in Tetris 99 using computer vision, classical AI, a lot of free time (46 points | 27 comments)
21. How Translation Works, Book Title Edition (45 points | 11 comments)
22. ArXiv LaTeX Cleaner: Clean the LaTeX code of your paper to submit to ArXiv (5 points | discuss)
23. Detroit’s revival takes shape after decades of decay (111 points | 129 comments)
24. Efficient Reasoning with Hidden Thinking (131 points | 34 comments)
25. Anything threatening to be a subculture is commodified before it can walk (2014) (177 points | 195 comments)
26. Integrated magneto-optics with ultra-high endurance for photonic inmem computing (5 points | discuss)
27. Hightouch (YC S19) Is Hiring a Distributed Systems Engineer ( | hide)
28. Decorator JITs: Python as a DSL (141 points | 34 comments)
29. Spotted hyena found in Egypt in 5k years (20 points | 7 comments)
30. New York claims a small victory in 'forever war on rats' (53 points | 149 comments)
